Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2013 09:27PM Kassylou wrote: Fab, I am so sorry you are going through this. I can not begin to understand your fear. Is there a breast specialist in your area? Many doctors and hospital have plans to help people with no insurance so be sure to ask about that when you call. I work at a hospital and would be happy to do some research for you. Tell me what town, state, your age, what else you want me to know and I will be happy to help find a solution, be sure to private message me the info. I am recovering from a bilateral mastectomy done on the 23rd of jan. I feel good and have the time to help. Kas
Posts.Title: Do I just let it go??? ...soooo confused! Fab4 Fab4
